House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: To obtain a 5-percent reduction in the civilian workforce of all three branches of the Federal Government.

summary.text: Urges the President and the Administrative Office of the United States Courts to work jointly with the Congress in order to achieve a five percent reduction of the Federal civilian work force in all branches from current levels by September 30, 1993. Urges that such reductions be made through attrition and in concert with relevant affirmative action plans and regulations in each branch. Affirms the need to achieve work force reductions without diminishing essential Government services.

titles.title: To obtain a 5-percent reduction in the civilian workforce of all three branches of the Federal Government.
